TextFormatUpdateEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The TextFormatUpdateEvent interface is a DOM event that represents a list of text formats that an {{glossary("Input Method Editor")}} (IME) window wants to apply to the text being composed in an editable region that's attached to an instance.

TextFormatUpdateEventGetTextFormats.summary: NOTE Experimental The getTextFormats() method of the interface returns an {{jsxref("Array")}} of objects that represent the formats that an {{glossary("Input Method Editor")}} (IME) window wants to apply to the text being composed.

TextFormatUpdateEventTextFormatUpdateEve.summary: NOTE Experimental The TextFormatUpdateEvent() constructor returns a new object.
